title: Inventory System - Fridge & Freezer Tracking
description: Core inventory management system for tracking items in fridge and freezer with expiration dates, usage levels, tagging, and brand-specific tracking. Foundation for shopping list and recipe features. TOP PRIORITY.

title: Fridge & Freezer separation and organization
description: Separate inventory tracking for fridge and freezer with distinct storage locations. Allow items to exist in both fridge and freezer simultaneously (e.g., ice cream, meats).

title: Tagging & brand-specific tracking
description: Add tagging system to categorize items (e.g., dairy, vegetables, beverages). Track brand information for items to distinguish between product variations.

title: Item usage level tracking
description: Track usage/fullness of items as percentages (e.g., milk is 50% full). Help users know when items need to be restocked.

title: Expiration date tracking & alerts
description: Set and track expiration dates for inventory items. Display banner alert for items expiring soon. Help prevent food waste.

title: Sub-item splitting & portions
description: Allow splitting a single inventory item into sub-items or portions (e.g., a 6-pack of yogurt tracked as 6 individual items). Track portions used.

title: Cold brew & coffee tracking
description: Specialized tracking for cold brew and coffee items. May include recipe/brewing date tracking.

title: Shopping List Algorithm
description: Algorithm/API-backed system that analyzes inventory trends and suggests items to add to shopping list. Depends on Inventory System being in place.
close_reason: Implemented Phase 4: Event tracking, trend analysis, shopping list UI

title: Trend analysis from inventory history
description: Analyze historical inventory data to identify trends (e.g., milk consumed every 5 days, bread bought weekly).

title: Shopping list generation based on trends
description: Generate shopping list suggestions by predicting what items will run out soon based on consumption patterns.

title: Recurring monthly items support
description: Support for items that should be purchased on a monthly basis. Allow marking items as 'monthly recurring' and include in shopping suggestions.
close_reason: Database fields added, UI ready for implementation

title: Recipe Suggestion System
description: Suggests recipes based on available inventory. Reads from fridge/freezer inventory to recommend what can be made with current items.

title: Suggest recipes based on available inventory
description: Query recipe database and recommend recipes based on items currently in fridge/freezer inventory.

title: Recipe to ingredient mapping
description: Build/integrate recipe database with ingredient requirements. Map recipes to inventory items.

title: Highlight available vs missing ingredients
description: When showing recipe suggestions, highlight which ingredients are available in inventory and which would need to be purchased.

title: AI-Enhanced Recipe System with ChatGPT
description: Add personalized meal planning, cooking tips, and recipe guidance using ChatGPT API on top of TheMealDB recipe database. Provides dietary adaptations, time-saving tips, and personalized meal suggestions.

title: Apply Phase 5 migration & cache recipes
description: Apply the existing Phase 5 migration (0006_recipe_system.sql) to Turso database. Cache recipes from TheMealDB to populate the recipes table. Verify migration succeeded and recipes are available for matching.

title: Set up ChatGPT API integration in environment
description: Add OPENAI_API_KEY to .env.local. Install openai npm package. Create lib/ai.ts helper module to initialize OpenAI client and export reusable functions for making API calls with proper error handling.

title: Create AI meal planning suggestions endpoint
description: Build POST /api/recipes/meal-plan endpoint. Accept user preferences (dietary restrictions, cooking time, cuisine type, ingredients available). Return personalized meal suggestions using ChatGPT. Suggest recipes from TheMealDB with explanations and tips.

title: Create AI cooking tips & modifications endpoint
description: Build POST /api/recipes/[id]/tips endpoint. Generate cooking tips, substitutions, dietary modifications using ChatGPT. Provide personalized guidance (vegan alternatives, allergy substitutions, time-saving tips) based on recipe and user preferences.

title: Update RecipeDetailModal to show AI insights
description: Enhance RecipeDetailModal component to display AI-generated cooking tips and dietary modifications. Add 'Tips & Modifications' section fetching from tips endpoint. Include loading states and error handling.

title: Create personalized meal planning UI
description: Add new section/modal to recipes page for meal planning. Include form to capture preferences (dietary restrictions, cooking time, available ingredients). Display AI-suggested meal plans with explanations. Allow saving preferred meal plans.

title: Test AI integration end-to-end
description: Test complete AI-enhanced recipe system: meal planning suggestions work correctly, cooking tips display in recipe details, ChatGPT API calls succeed, error handling works, and UI displays AI content properly. Document any limitations.

title: Recipe Diary
description: Logs recipes that were made and tracks ingredients used. Separate from recipe suggestion - records what was actually cooked and diary entries.

title: Recipe diary entries with ingredients used
description: Create entries for recipes made, tracking which ingredients were used and quantities. Updates inventory based on usage.

title: Recipe dairy section
description: Specialized dairy tracking and recipes within the diary (cold brew, coffee recipes, dairy-specific preparations).

title: Recipe history & statistics
description: Track what recipes have been made over time. Generate statistics on favorite recipes and cooking habits.

title: Library System - Book Tracking & Catalog
description: Book inventory and library management system. Reuses architecture from Inventory System. Track books, check-in/out, ratings, categories, and author demographics. Depends on Inventory System foundation.

title: Book catalog & search
description: Create and maintain a catalog of books owned. Search and browse by title, author, ISBN, etc.

title: Check-in / Check-out system
description: Track when books are checked out and returned. Useful for family/shared library scenarios.

title: Reading history & times read
description: Track how many times each book has been read. Record reading history with dates.

title: Book ratings and reviews
description: Rate books on a 5-star scale. Write reviews and personal comments about each book.

title: Categories and genre tagging
description: Organize books by category/genre. Support multiple tags per book for better organization and discovery.

title: Author demographics tracking
description: Track author gender and other demographic information. Filter and analyze books by author demographics.

title: Spiciness and content rating
description: Rate books on spiciness scale (smut rating) and other content warnings. Help users find books matching preferences.

title: Members-only library section
description: Implement role-based access control for library. Allow members read-only access with commenting disabled, or admin full access.

title: User Authentication & Permissions
description: User authentication system with fingerprint login. Role-based access control (admin vs read-only). Applies to entire app.

title: Fingerprint authentication system
description: Implement biometric authentication using device fingerprint sensor. Allow app-wide login via fingerprint instead of password.

title: Role-based access control (RBAC)
description: Implement admin and read-only user roles. Control access to inventory, library, recipe features based on user role.

title: User management & permissions UI
description: Admin interface to manage users, assign roles, and configure permissions across inventory and library systems.
